fi.jasteroids.entities
Class BoundaryCheckedEntity

java.lang.Object
  fi.jasteroids.entities.BoundaryCheckedEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
fi.cebylfwk.Collidible, fi.cebylfwk.component.Entity, fi.cebylfwk.Renderable, fi.cebylfwk.Resource, fi.cebylfwk.Updateable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AsteroidEntity, ShipEntity, ShotEntity
public abstract class BoundaryCheckedEntity
extends java.lang.Object
implements fi.cebylfwk.component.Entity, fi.cebylfwk.Collidible

BoundaryCheckedEntity is used to check game screen boundaries and wrap entity over to other side of the screen. All the JAsteroids game entities which should be wrapped over boundaries should extend this class. Also collision code is put here.

See Also:
Entity, Collidible
